thread.title: Good hotel in excellent position
thread.title_full: Good hotel in excellent position - Review of Hotel La Tamise - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: davidmT7670OQ
title: Good hotel in excellent position
text: The hotel is comfortable and the position excellent. On can walk to the Louvre, the opera, the Mus√©e d'Orsay, and so forth. Our room was a little on the small side and had no refrigerator, but otherwise was well appointed. We enjoyed our stay and the staff were particularly helpful and friendly.
